description: This file declares functions related to OVSDB (Open vSwitch Database) parsing and conversion to JSON format, as well as a message parsing function. It acts as an interface for interacting with OVSDB messages and configurations.

methods.name: ovsdb_insert_to_json
methods.description: Converts a configuration object and a unique ID into a JSON string for insertion into OVSDB.

methods.name: ovsdb_monitor_to_json
methods.description: Creates a JSON string to monitor a specific OVSDB table with given identifiers.

methods.name: ovsdb_monitor_cancel_to_json
methods.description: Generates a JSON to cancel a monitor on a specific OVSDB entity.

methods.name: ovsdb_delete_to_json
methods.description: Converts deletion parameters into a JSON string to delete an entry from OVSDB.

methods.name: ovsdb_parse_msg
methods.description: Parses a JSON message string of a given size for OVSDB communication.
